testcase.name: API Test should get user data from the API
testcase.classname: should get user data from the API

testcase.name: API Test Should log in successfully with valid credentials
testcase.classname: Should log in successfully with valid credentials

failure.message:
`cy.request()` failed on:
https://reqres.in/api/login
The response we received from your web server was:
> 400: Bad Request
This was considered a failure because the status code was not `2xx` or `3xx`.
If you do not want status codes to cause failures pass the option: `failOnStatusCode: false`
-----------------------------------------------------------
The request we sent was:
Method: POST URL: https://reqres.in/api/login Headers: { "Connection": "keep-alive", "user-agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Cypress/12.17.3 Chrome/106.0.5249.51 Electron/21.0.0 Safari/537.36", "accept": "*/*", "accept-encoding": "gzip, deflate", "content-type": "application/json", "content-length": 43 } Body: {"email":"eve@reqres.in","password":"city"}
-----------------------------------------------------------
The response we got was:
Status: 400 - Bad Request Headers: { "date": "Tue, 15 Aug 2023 08:29:54 GMT", "content-type": "application/json; charset=utf-8", "content-length": "26", "connection": "keep-alive", "x-powered-by": "Express", "access-control-allow-origin": "*", "etag": "W/\"1a-EGIcyP6BIiCXl5Gb1aph5CGf4VQ\"", "via": "1.1 vegur", "cf-cache-status": "DYNAMIC", "report-to": "{\"endpoints\":[{\"url\":\"https:\\/\\/a.nel.cloudflare.com\\/report\\/v3?s=qT%2Fqg8rLFoxaYSS9yctTHwjFZ7Uy497dEo28xRa3ssCB2nuCZ6pNU1d6iYn5vSJj3trMjQWB356z0iBhnGgslwOdUAw6fS6anFCdqWq9qJSSSYQHBqAIxNJW5g%3D%3D\"}],\"group\":\"cf-nel\",\"max_age\":604800}", "nel": "{\"success_fraction\":0,\"report_to\":\"cf-nel\",\"max_age\":604800}", "server": "cloudflare", "cf-ray": "7f70128d1bbf4a02-SIN" } Body: { "error": "user not found" }
https://on.cypress.io/request
